name: Adventures in Textia 3
tagline: The second follow up to the text-based game Adventures in Textia. This game now features graphics and platforming.
body:
### Hi!
This is the project website for the public domain game _Adventures in Textia 3_:
This game is built using [python](http://python.org/) and the [pygame](http://pygame.org/news.html) library.
```
$ cd your_repo_root/repo_name
$ git fetch origin
$ git checkout gh-pages
```
###Story
Were working on it...
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
